summary: 79% of children born after 2004 were vaccinated as well as 69% of the children residing in central Israel. decision sought to preserve Israel’s status as a polio-free country, to prevent the virus’ exportation into vulnerable polio-free countries. the law should also describe the circumstances which would justify the implementation of each and every sanction as well as the procedural safeguards designed for established decisions and fairness toward the individual(s) whose rights are infringed.
